reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, comfortable, and flattering, with a soft cotton/linen feel and very nice colors. Moreover, they appreciate its versatility as a summer dress option that works well for various occasions, and one customer mentions it's ideal for daytime to evening plans. However, the fit and fabric quality receive mixed feedback - while some say it runs true to size, others find it runs very big, and while some praise the material, others report poor quality. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and Comfortable!
items.body: I’m obsessed with this PRETTYGARDEN blue and white striped dress! It’s super cute, with adorable ties on the shoulders that add a fun, feminine touch. The dress is lined, so it feels well-made, and it has pockets, which is always a win! I’ve gotten so many compliments every time I wear it. It is also very flattering and is the perfect piece. I love that you can dress it up or make it super casual! The only downside is that the white part of the dress is a little see-through, so in certain lighting, you can see the blue fabric frayed pieces underneath. It’s not a dealbreaker, but something to keep in mind if you're looking for full opacity. Overall, though, I love it and would definitely recommend it! Read more
items.author: Cayla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute dress
items.body: Very cute dress. I’m 5ft tall and it goes to my ankles, which is perfect, because normally everything drags the ground. It’s very light and super comfortable and it’s not scratchy. Read more
items.author: Jenn's items

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: I got a ton of compliments on this dress. I love that the straps are adjustable and can be tied for tightness and length. The color is as expected and beautiful. The fabric is nice and soft and breathable. The top is a little loose but the cut is very flattering. Read more
items.author: Chris Ervin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful comfortable sun dress!!!
items.body: I absolutely LOVED this dress this summer! Its made great! I felt beautiful in it. I love my long dresses in the summer and I actually bought several online here and every single one fit perfectly. I was so happy. This dress is perfect for lunch or dinner or just shopping or a walk in the park. Read more
items.author: Jessica Ann Heyde

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: It’s big through the bodice. Bought a medium, I’m 5’6” 135 36C and I can grab a ‘handful’ on either side of the bodice. Length is fine, it’s pretty and for a full long dress the fabric is light not heavy and washes well. (I was hoping it might shrink a bit-nope). Since I washed it I don’t think I can exchange it. Read more
items.author: sculptress

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous graduation dress
items.body: Love the dress Have bought more colors Fit great,nice flow when walking Just a great dress. Read more
items.author: QUEEN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just get it!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. The colors and fabric are beautiful. Already put another color/print in my cart. Tie straps can be tied to suit you. Has pockets that don't bulge out and my bra doesn't show under arms. I'm 5'5, 165-170ish lbs, 38DDD, usually size 14 and the large fits perfectly. Highly recommend this if you're looking for a lovely, comfortable, summer dress. Read more
items.author: "Ro"

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress!
items.body: This dress was a win for a recent vacation. I’m 5’1’ and it was the perfect maxi length. It’s double lined on the skirt and not see through. The straps are thick enough to provide support, especially for those with a larger bust (I'm a 34F). Read more
items.author: Sierra A

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: S-blue White, S-black, S-brick Red Blue, Orange Beige Floral, F-blue Pink, S-khaki, F-purple Red, Leaves Green, F-red Yellow, F-blue-02, F-rust Red, S-rose Red, F-white Blue, S-green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
